text: Kim Kardashian has posted a hilarious clap back to a fan who accused her of making everything about herself, joking “ consistency is key ”. Kardashian, 37, came under fire for posting about her own pregnancy with daughter Chicago when asked about her sister Kylie Jenner giving birth to her first child. One fan tweeted : “ @ KimKardashian what was your reaction when you found out Kylie was pregnant!? # KUWTK. ” Kardashian replied : “ I was so happy knowing I was having a baby too. ” The comment riled one user who hit back : “ You always find ways to make things about yourself. ” Proving she has a sense of humour, Kardashian replied : “ Always! Consistency is key. ”
